name: Let Hawaii Happen VR
description: Visiting Hawaii as a tourist is amazing. But when you get to “Let Hawaii Happen” with a local as your guide, it’s a totally different experience. Start by paragliding into an island of your choice. Then, upon landing, a local will give you the most personal tour of their island — virtually-speaking.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: intel core i7 - 6700 3.4GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 Storage: 11 GB available space Additional Notes: Must meet Vive minimum requirements in addition to these
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: intel core i7 - 6700k 4.0GHz Memory: 32 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980ti Storage: 11 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Nice introduction to Hawaii...Start by holding down on the touch pad to begin the journey....Using my Vive...I am placed over the ocean paragliding in to a choice of 4 Islands.....right now there is only two Islands (Kauai and Big Island) available which you select by focusing in with your Vive.....you are transported into an environment within a short film....Great potential...hope to see more contents in the future..
